meanings.definition: To carve, mold, or stamp a design on a surface
meanings.sent1: She embosses her initials on the leather wallet.
meanings.sent2: The artist embosses intricate patterns on the metal sheet.
meanings.sent3: The baker embosses a heart shape on the cake for a special touch.
meanings.sent4: His talent embosses a unique style on all his creations.
meanings.sent5: The machine embosses the logo with precision and detail.

meanings.definition: To decorate with raised patterns or designs
meanings.sent1: He embosses the wedding invitations with elegant floral motifs.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman embosses the leather belt with a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The child embosses the playdough to create textured art.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity embosses the room with a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The tool embosses the metal with intricate swirls and shapes.

meanings.definition: To make a design stand out by raising it above the surface
meanings.sent1: The embossed logo on the book cover catches the eye.
meanings.sent2: The embossed seal embosses the certificate with authority.
meanings.sent3: The embossed pattern embosses the fabric with a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The embossed emblem embosses the uniform with distinction.
meanings.sent5: The embossed lettering embosses the card with elegance.
